value.stringValue: Awaiting completion of Final Inspection related to Demolition Permit
Awaiting completion of Initial Inspection related to Demolition Permit
Awaiting related Demolition Permit to reach Initial Inspection Status

constants.description: This is the API name of the building permit record type.
constants.name: Building_Permit_Record_Type_API

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates each phase and status outcome in order. For the first outcome whose conditions are met, the flow takes the associated path. If no outcome’s conditions are met, the flow takes the path for the default outcome.
decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Evaluate_Permit_Phase_and_Status
decisions.label: Copy 1 of Evaluate Permit Phase and Status

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates if this is a Building Permit. For the first outcome whose conditions are met, the flow takes the associated path. If no outcome’s conditions are met, the flow takes the path for the default outcome.
decisions.name: Evaluate_Is_Land_Disturbance_Permit
decisions.label: Evaluate Is Land Disturbance Permit

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates each phase and status outcome in order. For the first outcome whose conditions are met, the flow takes the associated path. If no outcome’s conditions are met, the flow takes the path for the default outcome.
decisions.name: Evaluate_Permit_Phase_and_Status
decisions.label: Evaluate Permit Phase and Status

decisions.name: Is_Demo_Permit_at_Initial_Inspection_Phase
decisions.label: Is Demo Permit at Initial Inspection Phase

formulas.description: This is the expiration date of the permit in MONTHS from the issued date of the building permit.
formulas.name: Expiration_Date

formulas.description: Calculates the current "Total Balance" for the permit record being created/updated.
formulas.name: Permit_Total_Balance
TotalBalanceTextFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Permit_Total_Balance}>0 , "Please pay outstanding balance amount of" + " $" + TEXT({!Permit_Total_Balance}), " ")

recordUpdates.description: This assignment element sets the permit phase to Closed and status to Closed. Additionally, Completion Date is set based on the Flow Global Variable.

variables.description: This is the issued date of the Building Permit when the permit is being issued (phase Issuance and status Pending). This date is set to the current date.
